scenario_text.value: Hm?
What is it, Kaito?
Hey, what happened to Aoi? Where’d she go?
Aoi? I mean, she’s right over...
What?! She’s gone!

Wha’? You’re kidding! She was standing right
there the whole time!
I didn’t notice her leave either!

Maybe the battle freaked her out, and she’s
hiding somewhere in the room!
Everyone take a look!

This place ain’t that big though, is it?
Where’s she gonna hide in the first place?!

Besides, did she disappear during the battle?!
If so, the enemy may have captured her...

I don’t think so... We took out all them
Kenzoku in the last fight.

Then...she ran off after the battle? But why
would she...?

(Aoi seemed to be thinking about Saki when
the Kenzoku showed up...)
(Did that make her all confused again?)

Takuma! Looks like she isn’t anywhere in this
room!
Damn it!

Anyone could tell how close she was to
snapping, and yet...

Oh no... How could this happen?! Even
I didn’t notice her disappear...
I’m afraid this could be very bad.

It’s my fault. This is all because I gave her
that vision.
Renamon, what exactly did you show Aoi?

I...don’t know. The contents of the vision
are based on what’s in the viewer’s heart.

Whatever deep-seated issue or fear looms
largest in Aoi’s mind would’ve come to life.

Where Aoi is concerned...only one specific
trauma comes to mind.

Yeah, it must’ve been about Saki! She’s still
caught up in a vision of her!
Guys, we’ve gotta hurry up and find her!

(If we don’t...I have a bad feeling. Like
something really awful’s gonna happen...)
(Aoi...please, return to your senses!)
